
0.1.2 
=====
  - Fix some bugs
  - Added bash script callback callbacks/consul_cb.sh for consul service - with a bit of jq gymnastics

0.1.1 
=====
  - Fix some bugs
  - Added containers
  - Customised ssl cert to docker-register
  - More resilent startup and logging
  - Added bash script callback callbacks/consul_cb.sh for consul service - with a bit of jq gymnastics
